ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua,Sodium Laureth Sulfate,Sodium Chloride,Cocamidopropyl Betaine,Coco-Glucoside,Glycol Distearate, Laureth-10,Cocamide MEA,Polyquaternium-44,PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate,Propylene Glycol,Citric Acid, Vitis Vinifera Juice,Mel,Hydrolyzed Silk, Trideceth-9, Bisabolol, Parfum, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone,CI 47005, CI 42051

product-info.opis: Suhim lasem in koži prinaša izdatno vlago, moč in zaščito, lase in telo napolni s svežino in z vitalnostjo ter jim podari zdrav, sijoč videz.- nega suhih las & telesa
